item.title: Welcome to my projects and research page!
item.description: I’m a passionate Ph.D. student of Theoretical Physics of Matter, at the department of Physics and Astronomy of University of Padova. I have background in optics and photonics for telecommunications, applied electrodynamics, systems and control theory, information theory, signals and systems, optimization methods for information engineering. My current research interests are in theoretical physic of matter: soliton propagation, highly nonlinear phenomena, Bose-Einstein condensation, quantum optics and applications. Other personal interests are pure and applied math, philosophy of science, science communication and STS, independent rock music, theater.
